repository.corpname: Oregon Historical Society, Davies Family Research Library

address.addressline: Oregon Historical Society Davies Family Research Library

did.abstract: Scrapbook, 1 vol., 1888-1912, containing records of the Yamhill County Republican Central Committee, 1892-1900, newspaper clippings regarding Yamhill County republican politics, 1888-1909, and clippings on various other political topics, 1900-1912. J. W. Hobbs was born in Indiana in 1856 and came to Oregon in 1882.

bioghist.p: J. W. Hobbs was born in Indiana in 1856 and came to Oregon in 1882.

scopecontent.p: Scrapbook, 1 vol., 1888-1912, containing records of the Yamhill County Republican Central Committee, 1892-1900, newspaper clippings regarding Yamhill County republican politics, 1888-1909, and clippings on various other political topics, 1900-1912.

acqinfo.p: Gift of Rosemary Hobbs Hone, May 1988.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to the public.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society is the owner of the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library prior to any use of reproductions. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use of reproductions may required seeking additional authorization from the copyright holders.

prefercite.p: J. W. Hobbs Scrapbook, Mss 1513, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.

controlaccess.subject: Politics and government -- Oregon -- Yamhill County.
